DOC.brief_summary: AIT-082 novel small molecule cross blood-brain barrier enhance nerve function increase level neurotrophic growth factor encourage nerve sprout brain . Preclinical study animal show AIT-082 improves memory age animal animal neurological deficit . This study double-blind placebo-controlled safety study design study whether AIT-082 may delay age-related mental decline . Eight healthy old volunteer two clinical site give single , weekly , rise dos AIT-082 placebo 5 week ; test side effect absorption ; underwent battery neuropsychological memory test , include word number recall test .
